2010

- JQuery
Discovered and fell in love with JQuery Develop 6 Professional Websites for Businesses in the following industry - Food and Restaurant (Magrellos) - Cakes and Baking (CakeTreat) - Branding and Marketing (Promomart) - Internet Software (Servorien) - Oil and Gas (Azenith) - Religion (RMM) Built my first Major Web Application - Gaming and Sport Betting Website - Custom made web app from scratch - Tech stack - PHP, MySQL, Jquery, HTML and CSS - Hosted on a shared hosting platform - 20 different Soccer Sport betting options - Optimized for mobile devices - Integrated payment and withdrawal - developed an advanced Admin end with games and odds setting, goal line etc - Reached a user base of 2500 active users in first two months of deployment - Reached 250,000+ active users in 2014

Created and deployed my first NodeJS App, and yes it was complex - A multilevel network app, - receiving payment in bitcoin (BitGo), - QRcode scan and pay - data managed with MySQL Redis, - Realtime data with Socket.io - RabbitMQ us for queuing messages (Emails, SMSes) - Docker and PM2 for deployment - Nuxtjs (Vue) in the frontend #SlotWork

2018
